content: the rising star baby blanket is a light weight and gorgeous crochet star baby blanket is a lovely gift for any expecting mother with a color pattern created for three colors this free crochet baby blanket pattern is perfect for anyone creating a blanket for a little one looking to enter the world this blanket is quick to work up once you get started and only consists of 35 row this pattern is crochet easy-intermediate you should know how to work in the round single_crochet and double_crochet there is a photo tutorial to help you through the first several rounds as well as a detailed graphic to help you with stitch counts you can use any light 3 weight yarn you prefer i used three colors each skein i purchased was 4 oz or 340 yards you can of course use a medium 4 weight or higher but it will create a larger blanket this crochet star baby blanket pattern was created for a little girl however you can easily change the colors to blue or green for a little boy you can use any light 3 weight yarn you prefer i used three colors each skein i purchased was 4 oz or 340 yards you can of course use a medium 4 weight or higher but it will create a larger blanket the pattern is written to gauge to be approximately 34 inches in diameter **this crochet pdf pattern includes ** 1 a full pdf version with written pattern and a photo tutorial for rounds 1 through 5 2 a printer friendly version with just the written pattern to save your ink 3 stitch count plus a detailed photo diagram to show how to count your stitches simply a the later rounds have hundreds of stitches - this simplified stitch count should help you count without losing your place **you will need the following tools ** 4 mm or hook indicated by your yarn weight tapestry needle to weave ends scissors stitch markers if you prefer them i hope you love this star baby blanket crochet pattern as much as i enjoyed designing it happy crocheting the loophole fox |copyright and permissions| this pattern is for personal use only please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose in whole or in part please do not re-publish this pattern or it s photos as your own you may sell items you personally have made from this pattern i just ask that you give credit to me and link to my blog when applicable
